About Us

The College Recommendation System (CRS) is designed to help students identify suitable colleges based on their 12th-grade cutoff marks, preferences, and the counseling process of Anna University. This system leverages historical admission data, current cutoff trends, and student preferences to provide personalized college recommendations.
